newsitem.title: UK: Gazprom shares at $19.00 in London.
newsitem.headline: Gazprom shares at $19.00 in London.

text.p: American Depositary Shares (ADS) of Russia's RAO Gazprom were trading at around $19.00 in London at 1030 gmt after being priced at $15.75 late on Monday.
"The after-market has been very strong and it has probably found its level now," said a trader at a major European bank.
The ADS had traded as high as $19.50 on Tuesday, but came off slightly from that level.
"There is a little bit of stock coming out," said the trader.
The offering was around five times oversubscribed, raising $373.3 million before a 15 percent overallotment option.
"It is too early to see that money flowing through in to other Russian counters, but it may start happening within a day or so," said the trader.
He expects blue chips LUKoil, which was at $41.50/$42.50, and Mosenergo, at $29.00/$30.00, to benefit from the disappointed money in Gazprom.
